snippet: Kevin Youkilis, a former Red Sox player, agreed to a one-year, $12-million deal with the Yankees to replace Alex Rodriguez at third base while he recovers from hip surgery.
abstract: Former Boston Red Sox star infielder Kevin Youkilis agrees to a one-year, $12-million deal with the New York Yankees to replace Alex Rodriguez at third base while he recovers from hip surgery; Youkilis' move is notable because his hard-nosed style personified the enmity between the rival teams.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Youkilis, a former Red Sox player, agreed to a one-year, $12-million deal with the Yankees to replace Alex Rodriguez at third base while he recovers from hip surgery.

headline.seo: Yankees Are Set to Add Kevin Youkilis, Symbol of Rivalry
headline.main: Yankees Are Set to Add Youkilis, Symbol of Rivalry
headline.print_headline: Yankees Are Set to Add Youkilis, Symbol of Rivalry
